--- title: Navigator.vendor slug: Web/API/Navigator/vendor summary: >- The value of the Navigator vendor property is always either "Google Inc.", "Apple Computer, Inc.", or (in Firefox) the empty string. tags: - API - HTML DOM - Property - Read-only ---

{{ APIRef("HTML DOM") }}

The value of the {{DomXref("Navigator")}} vendor property is always either "Google Inc.", "Apple Computer, Inc.", or (in Firefox) the empty string.

Syntax

venString = window.navigator.vendor

Value

  • Either "Google Inc.", "Apple Computer, Inc.", or (in Firefox) the empty string.

Specifications

Specification Status Comment

The compatibility table in this page is generated from structured data. If you'd like to contribute to the data, please check out https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data and send us a pull request.
